snippet.title: Sons of the Forest - Exclusive Multiplayer Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the latest trailer for Sons of the Forest, the first-person survival horror sequel to 2014's terrifying game The Forest launching into early access on Steam February 23. 

The Sons of the Forest Multiplayer trailer gives us a glimpse of some mysterious-looking caves, waves of mutant attacks and plenty of multiplayer gameplay.

#ign #sonsoftheforest #theforest
